Read in the data in Excel format

```{r}
fral <- read_xlsx("data/CMHN/CMNH glossy buckthorn Data Revised.xlsx", sheet = 1)
alin2 <- read_xlsx("data/CMHN/CMNH Alnus incana Data.xlsx", sheet = 1)
alse2 <- read_xlsx("data/CMHN/CMNH Alnus serrulata Data.xlsx", sheet = 1)
rhal <- read_xlsx("data/CMHN/CMNH Rhamnus alnifolia Data.xlsx", sheet = 1)
fram2 <- read_xlsx("data/CMHN/CMNH Fraxinus americana Data.xlsx", sheet = 1)
havi4 <- read_xlsx("data/CMHN/CMNH Hamamelis virginiana Data.xlsx", sheet = 1)
```
